mapper.select: select re.review_no , re.lesson_no , rem.nickname re_nickname , rem.mem_pic , re.star , re.review_content , re.enroll_Date re_enrolldate , rp.reply_no , rpm.nickname rp_nickname , rp.reply_content , rp.enroll_date rp_enrolldate from review re join member rem on(re.mem_no = rem.mem_no) left join reply rp on (re.review_no=rp.total_no and reply_type='후기' and rp.status='Y') left join member rpm on (rp.mem_no=rpm.mem_no) where lesson_no=1 order by review_no asc, reply_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into reply ( reply_no , mem_no , reply_content , reply_type , reply_level , total_no ) values ( seq_rep_no.nextval , #{memNo} , #{replyContent} , '후기' , 1 , #{totalNo} )
mapper.update: update reply set reply_content = #{replyContent} , modify_date = SYSDATE where reply_no = #{replyNo} and reply_type = '후기'
update review set status='N' , modify_date = SYSDATE where review_no = #{reviewNo}
update reply set status='N' , modify_date = SYSDATE where total_no = #{reviewNo} and reply_type = '후기'
